As the battle calmed down and slowly died, Blackfang straightened up 
and put his laser in its holster. He thought of Perceptor.

Blackfang: My knife is still in you. I will have to track you down and 
get it back myself, I think.

Then, he hears his leader giving some orders. He turns his head and 
listens.

Blackfang: Talos, I volunteer. I will track them down to their lair so 
we can one day take the war to them. Who will be going with me?

**********************************************************************

Under a tree, the she-Vok arose. First, she straightened her legs, 
then she transformed, her pincer-tail forming her left arm, her 
machine gun moving to her right. Her thrusters aligned in her back and 
her head popped up from her chest. Her white, blue and yellow colors 
shone in the sunlight. She finally spoke up.

Meteara: Magnificient! This was a worthy demonstration! Perhaps even 
worthy of some beings more powerful than the Cybertronians! 
Now, I need to discuss with the one who is in charge of this group. 
There are great things going on, and I need the cooperation of anyone 
who can help me.
